author: cbs8
title: Green Data Center Market to Grow at 27% CAGR by 2019 Says a New Research Report at RnRMarketResearch.com
text:
Global Green Data Center Market 2015 – 2019 is a new research that provides market landscape, analysis technology, and impact of drivers, challenges and trends. The green data center market report also provides vendor landscape.
Pune, MH (PRWEB) September 14, 2015
‘Global Green Data Center Market 2015-2019’ is a systematic articulation of elaborative sections that aims at conveying detailed business understanding to the user. The research report enlists the key-growth prospects of the green data center industry over the forecast period of 2015-2019. Also, the report evaluates the current market challenges and the ups-surging opportunities in the global market. According to the report forecast, the global green data center market is estimated to grow at a CAGR of 27.94% over the period 2014-2019.
The Complete Green Data Center Market Report of 73 pages is available at http://www.rnrmarketresearch.com/global-green-data-center-market-2015-2019-market-report.html .
‘Global Green Data Center Market 2015-2019’, starts with addressing all major facets of the industry, elaborating the business abbreviation, and decrypting the compound business terminologies for the user. The report has thoroughly explained the market research methodology, particularizing on the present market research procedures and the various economic gauges that may affect the research processes on various levels. The market explanation included in the research report offers a meticulous understanding of the global market whereabouts to the user. The section particularly talks about the functioning, business value, and comparing the green data center with other identical technologies. In the next section, the report drafts an in-depth analysis of the present market conditions, also conducting a five-force analysis on the industry, delivering premium insights on the global green data industry.
To calculate the market size, the report considers the revenue generated from the sales and services of the following:
 Data center equipment Powering and cooling solutions Monitoring and management solutions
The following companies are the key players in the Global Green Data Center Market: Cisco, Dell, EMC, HP, IBM and Oracle.
Other Prominent Vendors in the market are: APC, Eaton, Emerson, Fujitsu, Hitachi, Huawei, Juniper, and NetApp.
The entire green data center market is segmented in the research report, on the basis of the technology and on the basis of the key-regions of the business. The section thoroughly elaborates each and every facets of industry and enlists the global green data center market by technology over the period of 2014-2019 and global green data center market by geography within the time span of 2014-2019. In the further sections, the research report inclines its focus on highlighting the market drivers, the existing market challenges, and the latest market trends. Also, the section closely enlists each possible factor that can have a significant influence on major verticals of the global green data center market. From the numerous examples provided in the research report, few examples are as follows.
 Market Drivers - Increased Focus on Lowering the Energy Consumption in Data Centers Market Challenges - High Implementation Cost Market Trends - Increased Use of Energy Efficient Cooling Technologies
Purchase a Copy of Report at http://www.rnrmarketresearch.com/contacts/purchase?rname=411172 , Single User License Copy of Report at US $2500.
Lastly, the report drafts a key-vendor analysis, enlisting key-business strategies of the existing industry players. The section aims at delivering a ample understanding of the current competition scenario prevalent in the global green data centers market to the user. The section explains the key-facts, business overviews, development of the product, and SWOT analysis of each vendor. The report ends with a detailed conclusion that summarizes all the key-findings of numerous surveys and research modules that were studied by the industry experts while formulating the research report.
